h1_title: How to Unlock the Chapter 1 Secret Area
content: The final bell can be found in the Marsh of the White Mist. After the fight against the Whiteclad Noble, don’t go toward the building that leads to the Black Wind Cave.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Chapter_1_Secret_Area.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Chapter 1 Secret Area', specifically from the subsection 'Bell 3'.
The content is as follows:
The final bell can be found in the Marsh of the White Mist. After the fight against the Whiteclad Noble, don’t go toward the building that leads to the Black Wind Cave.
